alert.note: Alert for Chukchi Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 01 at 9:32PM AKST until March 02 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Chukchi Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 45 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds and low visibility in blowing snow is occuring at both Point Hope and Shishmaref. Winds are much less and visibility is much better near Kivalina. Winds will slowly decrease late tonight and conditions will slowly improve then.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas.
